description.ko: 고대 은하의 잔해가 절대적인 어둠의 바다 속에 떠다니고 중력이 현실의 구조를 휘게 만드는, 고요하고 차가운 외부 공허의 깊은 곳으로의 여정.
description.en: Journey into the silent, cold depths of the outer void, where the remnants of ancient galaxies drift in a sea of absolute darkness and gravity bends the fabric of reality.

prompt: Cinematic wide shot of VOID-3, a massive gravitational anomaly in the deep cosmos. Swirling dark matter, neon ethereal gas clouds in deep violet and obsidian, distant dying stars being pulled into a central vacuum. Hyper-realistic, 8k, celestial scale, dark aesthetic, volumetric lighting, intricate cosmic dust textures.
